recommendations: Shubham Ranka “I've personally mentored Mayanka very closely for over an year. During this course of mentorship, I've seen him failing multiple times, yet not giving up. and finally he succeeded in his dream of MBA. Mayanka comes as a very hard working person, good with his analytical and problem solving skills. He would truly be a good asset to any company. Wish him all the best !”

Allison Wellington “Mayank was a good problem solver in the project. He was new to front end integrations but he picked up the tasks quickly in the product and come up with innovative solutions. He is a great team player and always support his team members. He is autonomous as well as a good team player. He posses great technical skills like critical thinking, problem-solving and data-centric decision making. Also, his communication skills make him an ideal candidate for complex Products. All the best for your future endeavours!”
